channel.title: Internship Position Available
channel.description:
We have an Intern position available in our RSPS development project. You'll be working with other highly skilled team members on cutting edge technology, revolutionising private server development as we know it. A normal day working on this project will include regular technological breakthroughs. This opportunity could put you in the perfect position to gain a full time position in our development project, and provide you with valuable silicon valley connections.
You should have Java experience, ideally applied to the RSPS paradigm. Additional RSPS experience will add significant value to your application. Please include a short covering statement and some method of contacting you (ideally Skype or Email).
Applications are now open and will close on [b]21 February 2014[/b]. Please post your applications to this topic or email matty.j.thompson@gmail.com.

item.title: Internship Position Available
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Want a development team? Look here first!

You need to provide some sort of evidence that your development team will be successful (ie, pictures).

There’s just no effort put into the post at all, and looking at his signature (which isnt a real website) it just looks like a troll to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Internship Position Available
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:540024”]There’s no way this is serious, I think Tom is just being trolled. Even if this is serious, it doesn’t meet the requirements for a development team post and does not belong here.[/quote]What requirements does it not meet?

Read full topic

item.title: Internship Position Available
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Sorry, we would love to provide more information on our progress but as you can imagine it’s mostly very sensitive information. We have a legal and ethical responsibility to protect the intellectual property of our providers, vendors and clients. We’re just trying to operate within the framework we have been provided with.

Read full topic

item.title: Internship Position Available

We have an Intern position available in our RSPS development project. You’ll be working with other highly skilled team members on cutting edge technology, revolutionising private server development as we know it. A normal day working on this project will include regular technological breakthroughs. This opportunity could put you in the perfect position to gain a full time position in our development project, and provide you with valuable silicon valley connections.
